Package estgconstroi

Interface EventManager

public interface EventManager

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG) | Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI) e Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP) - 2021/2022

The EventManager interface provides the methods for an event manager system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNotifier(Notifier notifier)
    Adds a notifier to the event manager.
    Event[]
    getEvent(EventPriority priority)
    Gets the events of the event manager with the specified priority.
    Event[]
    getEvent(Class c)
    Gets the events of the event manager with the specified class, e.g., Incident, Accident or Failure.
    Event[]
    getEvent(LocalDate date)
    Gets the events of the event manager with the specified date.
    Event[]
    getEvent(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
    Gets the events of the event manager between the specified dates.
    void
    removeAllEvents()
    removes all events from the event manager.
    void
    removeEvent(Event event)
    Remove the event from the event manager.
    void
    removeNotifier(Notifier notifier)
    Removes a notifier to the event manager.
    void
    reportEvent(Event event)
    Adds an event to the event manager.The event must be reported using all the notifiers to the Manager and the Team Leader of the construction site .

  • Method Details

    • addNotifier

      void addNotifier(Notifier notifier) throws EventManagerException
      Adds a notifier to the event manager.
      Parameters:
      notifier - The notifier to be added.
      Throws:
      EventManagerException - if the notifier already exists

    • removeNotifier

      void removeNotifier(Notifier notifier) throws EventManagerException
      Removes a notifier to the event manager.
      Parameters:
      notifier - The notifier to be removed.
      Throws:
      EventManagerException - if the notifier does not exists

    • reportEvent

      void reportEvent(Event event) throws EventManagerException
      Adds an event to the event manager.The event must be reported using all the notifiers to the Manager and the Team Leader of the construction site .
      Parameters:
      event - The event to be added and notified.
      Throws:
      EventManagerException - if the event already reported

    • removeAllEvents

      void removeAllEvents()
      removes all events from the event manager.

    • removeEvent

      void removeEvent(Event event) throws EventManagerException
      Remove the event from the event manager.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to be removed.
      Throws:
      EventManagerException - if the event already exists

    • getEvent

      Event[] getEvent(EventPriority priority)
      Gets the events of the event manager with the specified priority.
      Parameters:
      priority - for event selection
      Returns:
      The events of the event manager with the specified priority.

    • getEvent

      Event[] getEvent(Class c)
      Gets the events of the event manager with the specified class, e.g., Incident, Accident or Failure.
      Parameters:
      c - Event class to be filtered
      Returns:
      The events of the event manager with the specified priority.

    • getEvent

      Event[] getEvent(LocalDate date)
      Gets the events of the event manager with the specified date.
      Parameters:
      date - for event selection
      Returns:
      The events of the event manager with the specified priority.

    • getEvent

      Event[] getEvent(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Gets the events of the event manager between the specified dates.
      Parameters:
      startDate - for event selection
      endDate - for event selection
      Returns:
      The events of the event manager between the specified dates.
